scripts.build-docs: npm run build-contract-docs && npm run build-indexer-docs
scripts.build-contract-docs: npx documentation build src/contracts/** --parse-extension ts -f md -o docs/contracts.md --shallow
scripts.build-indexer-docs: npx documentation build src/indexer/** --parse-extension ts -f md -o docs/indexer.md --shallow
scripts.build-types-docs: npx documentation build src/types.ts --parse-extension ts -f md -o docs/types.md --shallow
